wikipedia_page.main: Cynthia Jebb, Baroness Gladwyn (née Noble; 20 November 1898 – 21 September 1990) was an English political hostess and diarist. She was noted as the wife of the UK's representative on the Security Council of the United Nations and as a hostess in Paris where her husband was the British Ambassador.

response: *Cynthia Jebb, Lady Gladwyn (1898–1990), English diarist and socialite
